 Inference quantifying antecedent, nested antecedent, and consequent, with a strong hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2006.)
statement:
ral2imi.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
ral2imi $p |- ( A. x e. A ph -> ( A. x e. A ps -> A. x e. A ch ) ) $.
